name: 5 Pack Reading Glasses for Women/Men - Fashion Blue Light Readers Computer Eyeglasses W/Spring Hinge&Case(2.5)
short_description: HIGH-PERFORMANCE BLUE LIGHT BLOCKING: Womens /Mens reading glasses provide advanced protection against harmful bluelight, featuring UV400 shielding technology. They effectively filter high-energy blue rays emitted by digital screens—including computers, phones, and electronic devices—while reducing glare, preventing dry eyes, and relieving eyestrain.

SUPERIOR LENS CLARITY: Designed with precision magnification and scratch-resistant HD lenses, these readers ensure 99% high-definition light transmission and authentic color vision. The lenses include anti-fog, anti-reflective, and blue-ray filtering coatings to deliver comprehensive visual performance.

CHIC WOMEN’S READING EYEWEAR: Combining reliability and fashion, these blue light blocking glasses are crafted from high-quality material. Readers offer a perfect balance of functionality, comfort, and elegance, effortlessly complementing various outfit styles while reducing the chance of misplacement.

COMFORTABLE & FEATHER-LIGHT DESIGN: Equipped with flexible spring hinges for a secure and adaptive fit that suits a wide range of face shapes. Soft integrated nose pads alleviate pressure on the bridge for all-day comfort and adjustable ease.
WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE: A set of 5 style reading glasses, 5 premium PU leather protective cases, and 5 black soft cleaning cloths
